{"id":1052355173,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1695015908,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"118 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1052355173/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Row With Maximum Ones","memory":"61 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> rowAndMaximumOnes(vector<vector<int>>& mat) {\n        vector<int> res(2, 0);\n        \n        for (auto i = 0; i < mat.size(); i++) {\n            int t = count(mat[i].begin(), mat[i].end(), 1);\n            if (res.back() < t)\n                res = { i, t };\n        }\n\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"row-with-maximum-ones","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
